Statements

Class Statement

  • java.lang.Object
    • Statements.Statement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompoundStatement, SimpleStatement

    public abstract class Statement
extends java.lang.Object
implements Runnable
    a superclass for all statements that consists of Simple statement and Compound statement .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Statement() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean match(java.lang.String statement, java.lang.String[] patterns)
      compares a string to all patterns of a statement and and return true if string is match to one of the patterns .
      static Statement statementDetector(java.lang.String statement)
      compares a string to all statement's patterns that defined and returns a suitable statement according to this comparision .

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface Statements.Runnable

    • Method Detail

      • statementDetector

        public static Statement statementDetector(java.lang.String statement)
        compares a string to all statement's patterns that defined and returns a suitable statement according to this comparision .
        Parameters:
        statement - the string to compare to all statements' patterns
        Returns:
        a simple statement according to comparision

      • match

        public static boolean match(java.lang.String statement,
                            java.lang.String[] patterns)
        compares a string to all patterns of a statement and and return true if string is match to one of the patterns .
        Parameters:
        statement - the string to compare to patterns
        patterns - the array of patterns of a statements
        Returns:
        true if string is match to one of the patterns
